list.name: HEARTY-RECOVERY
list.description: Upon recalling his Knuckle Busters, Sam instantly recovers x% of his missing health.
list.descriptionHtml: Upon recalling his Knuckle Busters, Sam instantly recovers x% of his missing health.

list.name: REMOTE-RECHARGE
list.description: While the Knuckle Busters are on the ground and near enemies, they will charge up Sam's Super.
list.descriptionHtml: While the Knuckle Busters are on the ground and near enemies, they will charge up Sam's Super.
